greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is n-th term of the Euler transform of -n,1,1,1,... .
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3260
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0 or i<2,
binomial(k+n-1, n), add(b(n-i*j, i-1, k), j=0..n/i))
b:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, add(
mathematica: Table[SeriesCoefficient[(1 - x)^n*Product[1/(1 - x^k), {k, 2, n}], {x, 0, n}], {n, 0, 30}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 07 2018 *)
b[n_, k_] := b[n, k] = If[n == 0, 1, If[k == 1, PartitionsP[n], b[n, k + 1] - b[n - 1, k + 1]]]; Table[b[n, -n], {n, 0, 40}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 07 2018, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 18 2017
